snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 531: Mecha Madness (SAGE2008-2009)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Mecha Madness
Credit: Streak Thunderstorm
Release Date: August 17th 2008

Revisit-2008: - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v9H7N-LUxTQ
My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Angel Island Act 1
09:53 - Angel Island Arcade Edition

NOTES: Ah yes... Mecha Madness.
A title going as far back as TKgames... Where it had a slightly different title.
To describe this is like... experiencing that Flash Animation DBZ fantasy in Newgrounds or so.
But in Game form...
In this title we have Sonic going absolutely nuts with elemental powers.
Deforming the earth, endless air dashing, not caring about water and then some...
Of course the enemies seem to also not take this lightly as they won't act as just mere punching bags.
At the end of this all we meet E-... A literal Griffin who appears to be really upset with us.
Even with all this power this bird refuses to get its wings clipped.
Sonic also seems to level up his stats in combat among other, also having his Super form.
Now... What's the real point of this game? Outside of intense combat and an engine that is way over the top for its time.
I would say fighting a series of Mecha Sonics and all that fancy stuff that... also don't exist in this build...
Speaking of that these probably ain't the actual SAGE2008-2009 versions.
A South Island build would be the 2008 one supposedly that I don't have as of making of this vid.
This game also suffered a bit of data corruption during development among other...
At some point this was supposed to get a 3D remake, not sure what happened to that...
I like this in 2D more but that's just me.
Overall ye pretty chaotic and fun for how little while it lasts.

(ISSUES)

1. May Crash.
2. Possible to go out of bounds and softlock.
